greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 3's when n is written in base b for 2<=b<=n+1.
mathematica: f[n_] := Count[Flatten@ Table[ IntegerDigits[n, b], {b, 2, n + 1}], 3]; Array[f, 80] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 14 2012 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
